    source={
        "index": "my-data-stream",
        "query": {
            "range": {
                "@timestamp": {
                    "gte": "now-7d/d",
                    "lte": "now/d"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    dest={
        "index": "new-data-stream",
        "op_type": "create"
    },
)
